medical_history.chief_complaint: Itching and diffused erythema, cough, asthma, palpebral-labial edema, and rhinoconjunctivitis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The reaction began after using latex gloves. The patient also referred dyspnoea, conjunctivitis and rhinitis every time she entered the coronary unit in which she worked. Additionally, there were three months of oculorhinitis and asthma between December and February.
medical_history.social_history: 35-year-old nurse; occupation may expose her to latex.
